display_long_description:
BeatSabylon is an atmospheric flying shooter built for VR, set in the year 2045. Humanity has created the Quantum Resonator, a device that sends human consciousness into a compressed quantum world where space bends unpredictably and reality constantly shifts.

Inside this unstable dimension, threats emerge as rogue constructs, unstable nodes, and anomalies that traditional soldiers cannot handle. Only gamers — fast, adaptive, and instinct-driven — can operate inside such distorted physics.

Once inside the Resonator, you enter fractured arenas made entirely of geometric distortions. Shapes twist, structures float, and the environment reshapes around you. With jet-powered movement and precise VR controls, you rely on instinctive flying and sharp shooting to survive.

The rules are simple:
• Defend the Red Blocks that stabilize the quantum field.
• Take down the Cylinders before they overload the system.
• Showcase your flying and shooting skills .

Every twist of your chair and movement of your hands becomes part of the simulation. As threats escalate, you must adapt quickly and push your abilities to the limit. The Quantum Resonator needs a new kind of warrior — and that warrior is you.

Let the Quantum Simulation begin.
